name: BLAST THEM!
description:
A Breakout-type game with extravagant explosions and a semi-realtime 'flow'.

KEYBOARD or TOUCHSCREEN controls:

Arrow Left/Right or Swipe Left/Right: Rotate the cannon

Arrow Up or Tap Screen: Fire!

You get 5 shots per turn.

Bricks shrink when hit and explode after a couple of hits.

White bricks score 3 points when destroyed.

Yellow bricks score 6 points when destroyed.

Smoking bombs score 15 points when destroyed, and grant a bonus of 15 shots for 1 turn.

Diamonds score 40 points when destroyed, and grant a bonus of 40 shots for 1 turn.
